detaileddescription.para:
Create a gauge objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new gauge
copy
pointer to a gauge object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created gauge

Set the number of needles
gauge
pointer to gauge object
needle_cnt
new count of needles
colors
an array of colors for needles (with 'num' elements)

Set the value of a needle
gauge
pointer to a gauge
needle_id
the id of the needle
value
the new value

Set minimum and the maximum values of a gauge
gauge
pointer to he gauge object
min
minimum value
max
maximum value

Set a critical value on the scale. After this value 'line.color' scale lines will be drawn
gauge
pointer to a gauge object
value
the critical value

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_obj_t *gauge, uint16_t angle, uint8_t line_cnt, uint8_t label_cnt)
memberdef.name: lv_gauge_set_scale

detaileddescription.para:
Set the scale settings of a gauge
gauge
pointer to a gauge object
angle
angle of the scale (0..360)
line_cnt
count of scale lines. The get a given "subdivision" lines between label, line_cnt = (sub_div + 1) * (label_cnt - 1) + 1
label_cnt
count of scale labels.

Set the styles of a gauge
gauge
pointer to a gauge object
type
which style should be set (can be only LV_GAUGE_STYLE_MAIN)
style
set the style of the gauge

Get the value of a needle
gauge
pointer to gauge object
needle
the id of the needle
the value of the needle [min,max]

Get the count of needles on a gauge
gauge
pointer to gauge
count of needles

Get the minimum value of a gauge
gauge
pointer to a gauge object
the minimum value of the gauge

Get the maximum value of a gauge
gauge
pointer to a gauge object
the maximum value of the gauge

Get a critical value on the scale.
gauge
pointer to a gauge object
the critical value

Set the number of labels (and the thicker lines too)
gauge
pointer to a gauge object
count of labels

Get the scale number of a gauge
gauge
pointer to a gauge object
number of the scale units

Get the scale angle of a gauge
gauge
pointer to a gauge object
angle of the scale

Get the style of a gauge
gauge
pointer to a gauge object
type
which style should be get (can be only LV_GAUGE_STYLE_MAIN)
pointer to the gauge's style
